title: Laptops
body: I'm looking for a laptop price range 100-400 kinda Low on budget as I am a collage kid. I plan to use this laptop for lol and school work thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Both the threads you made regarding this would be better suited for the [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [GD](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion) boards.

This board is primarily for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game.
